reviews.review_msg: I felt Michaela was hard on marking - she taught us nothing instrumental to our learning. We went over the same topics over and over again and while I understand the significance, I learnt nothing in this course. I think she did not make students interested in the course and while I have a good grade, I feel like I wasted money taking this course.

She is a VERY hard marker and you have to read her rubrics at least five times to get a decent grade on assignments. There are a lot of different assignments throughout the semester. The course was also disorganized and I felt like we were learning the same thing every week instead of different topics. Avoid this course if you can.
